## Source: ossf-package-analysis (236bea5646a5f41a1a00049315bf89b5d58d75f522e1d1dbc8bbc86d85e10919)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'dva-loading-hide-rce' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
